articles.title: Education
articles.description: “Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school.” - Albert Einstein
articles.contents:
Master of IT in
Business - Analytics Track
Singapore Management University (Aug 2021 - Nov 2022) 
Main Modules
Applied Machine Learning
Data Science for Business
Visual Analytics using Tableau
Text Analytics
Python Programming and Data Analysis
Applied Statistical Analysis with R
Data Analytics Lab using Jmp Pro 16
Data Management
Internet of Things
Bachelor
of Technology - Electronics and Communication Engineering
SCMS School of Engg and Tech, Mahatma Gandhi University (Sept 2001
- Jun 2005)

Electronics Engineering
Electromagnetic Waves
Digital Signal Processing
Control Systems
Electrical Engineering

articles.title: Experience
articles.description: “The only source of knowledge is experience” - Albert Einstein
articles.contents:
Data Analyst Intern


Jan 2022 - Jun 2022


 DHL, Singapore
Global Logistics Company
Developed PowerBi Dashboard for HR Team to visualize the
Vaccination status of Employees using Python and MS SQL.
Appreciated by Team Lead for the contribution to Resource
Management Application developed for Finance and Operation Teams, using
ASP.net and MS SQL. Successfully solved the security concerns raised
during Penetration Testing and secured Security Sign off.
Enhancement of PD Digitalization Dashboard to eliminate manual
intervention.
Involved in the Deployment of Web Chat Analytics Tool and Call
Data Extraction from Avaya for Speech Analytics tool.


QA Coordinator


Jul 2018 – Dec 2020


 Expleo Solutions, Singapore

IT services and consulting company, deployed to AVIVA
Insurance
Reviewed and delivered multiple reports for Financial
Consultants
Collaborated with Business Users, Development Team and Support
Teams to execute project deliverables within stipulated
timelines.
Proposed and implemented process changes to eliminate defects
right from requirement analysis stage.
Demonstrated and convinced the Business to the advantage of
automating data verification and convinced the Business users to adopt
the latest technology.


QA Team Lead


Aug 2013 - Jul 2018


Vervali Systems, Mumbai, India

IT Services Company for Neogov, USA
Managed a Team of 8 spread across different time zones
Estimated and planned testing activities to align with the
Project plan
Defined and documented strategy to ensure quality
standards
Verified major overhaul of Application and ensured minimal
defects in Production
Handled the verification of data migration and gained
commendation for successful completion of project
Identified and highlighted risk factors, effectively mitigating
project delays


Assistant Business Analyst


Jul 2009 - Jul 2010


 Integro Technologies, Singapore

IT services and consulting company, deployed to OCBC
Handled Requirement Gathering through Discussions with Business
Users and Documentation
Collaborated with Business Users and Development Team to identify
and resolve Production issues
Conducted User trainings to ensure efficient use of the
system
Verified and successfully delivered application that met user
expectations
Collaborated with Quality and Business Team to ensure timely
delivery of application


Test Engineer


Nov 2008 - Jul 2009


 Encora Technologies, Singapore

IT services and consulting company, deployed to UOB
Verification of transaction logs in XML format on Unix server
Developed and executed testcases that helped isolate defects in the
application
Prepared Defect Status Report to highlight the progress of the
project to the stakeholders
Conducted User trainings to ensure efficient use of the
system


Software Developer


Jan 2006 - Dec 2007


 UST Global, India

IT services and consulting company for Anthem Insurance,
USA
Handled Requirement Gathering through Discussions with Business
Users and Documentation
Collaborated with Business Users and Development Team to identify
and resolve Production issues
Conducted User trainings to ensure efficient use of the
system
Verified and successfully delivered application that met user
expectations
Collaborated with Quality and Business Team to ensure timely
delivery of application

articles.title: Rakendu Ramesh
articles.contents:
ABOUT
Data Scientist passionate about solving real word business problems
using data, with focus on understanding the problem, having knowledge of
the various techniques that can be applied, narrowing down on the most
effective solutions and finally picking the best solution with the
knowledge that the complex solutions need not be the best solution.







PORTFOLIO

visualise classification of subzones in singapore based on something
